GTiff.title: GeoTiff
GTiff.description: Export to GeoTiff. Doesn't support cloud-optimized GeoTiffs (COGs) yet.

tiled.description: This option can be used to force creation of tiled TIFF files [true]. By default [false] stripped TIFF files are created.

jpeg_quality.description: Set the JPEG quality when using JPEG.

links.title: GDAL on the GeoTiff file format and storage options

version.description: Set GeoPackage version. In AUTO mode, this will be equivalent to 1.2 starting with GDAL 2.3.

links.title: GDAL on GeoPackage for raster data
GDAL on GeoPackage for vector data

table.description: **RASTER ONLY.** Name of the table containing the tiles. If the GeoPackage dataset only contains one table, this option is not necessary. Otherwise, it is required.

links.title: GDAL on GeoPackage for raster data
GDAL on GeoPackage for vector data
